Version 2.0.18 - Enhanced Resume Field + Direct Navigation Fallback

Improvements

  • Modify "resume" field - the KEY field Storyline uses for resume position
  • Handles both formats: "resume":"0_7" (scene_slide) and "resume":"7"
  • Also modify CurrentSlideIndex and currentSlide fields
  • Direct navigation fallback at 1.5s, 3s, 5s after load

Technical Details

  • Storyline stores resume position in "resume" field, not just "l"
  • Format: "resume":"0_7" = scene 0, slide 7 (0-indexed)
  • Fallback uses navigateToSlide() function if suspend_data modification fails
  • Added debug logging for data samples

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.17: Intercept suspend_data writes to prevent revert
  • v2.0.16: URL-based slide navigation (?slide=X) for embed
  • v2.0.15: LMSGetValue interception for navigation
  • v2.0.14: Progress tracking & suspend_data enhancements
